doc:
Jeremy Sisto https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jeremy_Sisto 0 Jeremy Merton Sisto (born October 6, 1974) is an American actor, producer, and writer. Sisto had recurring roles as Billy Chenowith in HBO's Six Feet Under and as NYPD Detective Cyrus Lupo in NBC's Law Order. He also starred in the comedy Clueless (1995), the biblical television film Jesus (1999), the drama Thirteen (2003), and the horror film Wrong Turn (2003). In 2004, he portrayed bigoted baseball player Shane Mungitt in Take Me Out, for which he was nominated for a Los Angeles Drama Critics Circle Award for Featured Performance in a Play. In 2006, Sisto starred in Festen on Broadway. From 2011 until its ending in 2014, he starred as George Altman in the ABC sitcom Suburgatory, for which he was nominated for a Critics' Choice Television Award for Best Actor in a Comedy Series. Sisto co-wrote the screenplay for the comedy film Break Point (2014), in which he also starred. In 2015, he starred in A's The Returned. From 2016 to 2018, Sisto portrayed Freddy Green in the Audience Network drama series Ice. In 2018, Sisto also portrayed Jubal Valentine in the CBS drama series FBI. Jeremy_Merton_Sisto ( born October_6_,_1974 ) is an_American_actor , producer , and writer . Sisto had_recurring roles as Billy_Chenowith in HBO 's_Six_Feet Under_and_as NYPD_Detective_Cyrus_Lupo in NBC 's_Law_ . He also starred in the_comedy_Clueless_(_1995_) , the_biblical_television_film_Jesus_(_1999_) , the_drama_Thirteen_(_2003_) , and the_horror_film_Wrong_Turn_(_2003_) . In 2004 , he portrayed bigoted_baseball_player_Shane_Mungitt in Take Me Out , for which he was_nominated for a_Los_Angeles_Drama_Critics_Circle_Award for Featured_Performance in a_Play . In 2006 , Sisto starred in Festen on Broadway . From 2011 until its_ending in 2014 , he starred as George_Altman in the_ABC_sitcom_Suburgatory , for which he was_nominated for a_Critics '_Choice_Television_Award for_Best_Actor in a_Comedy_Series . Sisto co-wrote the_screenplay for the_comedy_film Break Point_(_2014_) , in which he also starred . In 2015 , he starred in A 's_The Returned . From 2016 to 2018 , Sisto portrayed Freddy_Green in the_Audience_Network_drama_series_Ice . In 2018 , Sisto also portrayed Jubal_Valentine in the_CBS_drama_series_FBI .
